A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's unbelievable how bad this movie is.

Disney bought the Golden Goose.  JJ Abrams had it lay a few Golden Eggs... then Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson in their incompetence thought the best direction to go was to cook the Golden Goose and sell it as fried chicken.

Now that they killed the Golden Goose the franchise is dead with over half their fan base\, which was the largest fan base in the world.

Heads should roll for this one.

Never thought I'd see the day where Star Wars was "Jumping the Shark".
